title: RuPaul's Drag Race UK Blu Hydrangea on LGBTQ rights in Northern Ireland
text:
Blu wants to use the show as a platform (Picture: BBC)

Blu Hydrangea is repping Northern Ireland on RuPaul’s Drag Race UK as the only queen from the region on season one.

But as well as serving looks with a charming accent, Blu wants to bring attention to issues in her hometown while on the show.

The 23-year-old, who is from Belfast, wants to raise awareness of the lack of equal rights for LGBTQ+ people in Northern Ireland – with same-sex marriage not legally recognised there, despite being legal in England, Scotland, Wales and the Republic of Ireland.

Speaking to Metro.co.uk, Blu said: ‘There’s a lot going on in Ireland at the minute, so it’s nice to have that platform to bring the conversation and open it up in the UK.

Blu is from Belfast (Picture: BBC)

‘Like, we’re still over here in black and white while you’re living your lives in colour.’

Blu previously opened up about wanting to get married in her VT for Drag Race UK, saying: ‘My partner and I have been together for four and a half years. I would love to marry him but it’s not even legal. We don’t even want to get engaged yet until it’s legal and then we can do our thing.

‘So hopefully, I’ll inspire people and hopefully , one day we’ll be able to get married in our own country.’

Blu had a strong start on Drag Race UK Picture: BBC)

While she wants to use Drag Race as a platform, Blu is also feeling the pressure: ‘Especially when you find out you’re the only queen from a whole island! The other queens are like, I’m repping for Leeds! I’m repping for the whole of Ireland.’

Blu, who describes herself as ‘queen of the makeup brush’, had a strong star on RuPaul’s Drag Race UK with her Belfast-inspired runway look, which saw her strapping the Harland and Wolff cranes to her back.

She said: ‘I’m representing Belfast. The Harland and Wolff cranes helped build the Titanic and also my dad and my grandad worked on them.’

But that was overshadowed by her Queen Elizabeth realness look, which saw Blu dressed as a pound coin.
